## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [alignLatitude(points, referencePoint)](./harp-geoutils.transversemercatorutils.alignlatitude.md) | <code>static</code> | There are two regions on projected space that have same geo coordinates, it's the entire lines <code>{ x: [0..1], y: 0 }</code> and <code>{ x: [0..1], y: 1 }</code> they both have geo coordinates of <code>(0, [-90..+90])</code> and should be aligned somehow to fall into first or second region to make proper bounding boxes, tile bounds, etc. |
|  [alignLongitude(points, referencePoint)](./harp-geoutils.transversemercatorutils.alignlongitude.md) | <code>static</code> | There are two regions on projected plane, <code>{ x: 0.5, y: [0..0.25] }</code> and <code>{ x: 0.5, y: [0.75..1] }</code> that represent longitude edge where <code>-180</code> and <code>+180</code> met. Points falling in this regions should be aligned to get proper boxes etc. |
